T.query: select e.emp_no,s.from_date, de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no, de.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date and t.to_date = s.to_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no where s.from_date > '1995-11-29'

F.query: select e.emp_no,s.from_date, de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no, de.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.to_date and t.to_date = s.to_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no where s.from_date > '1995-11-29'

select e.emp_no,s.from_date, de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no, de.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no where s.from_date > '1995-11-29'

select e.emp_no,s.from_date, de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no, de.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date and t.to_date = s.to_date and t.emp_no = s.salary join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no where s.from_date > '1995-11-29'

select e.emp_no,s.from_date, de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no, de.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no left join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date and t.to_date = s.to_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no where s.from_date > '1995-11-29'
